title: Product Manager Software Computer Platform
description:
*Want to influence the bigger picture? At Saab, you can realise amazing innovations that keep people and societies safe. Together, we can truly make an impact – and your part matters.*


Your Role


Our sensor systems are at the forefront of innovation, and we are looking to expand our team with a Product Manager for our compute software stack. This role is crucial for driving the technical direction and ensuring our products meet the highest standards of innovation, market, and customer needs.


As a Product Manager, your main responsibilities will include:

* Developing and maintaining technical roadmaps that align with our strategic goals and market opportunities.
* Collaborating closely with cross-functional teams, including software engineers, systems architects, and product management, to deliver cutting-edge solutions.’
* Drive platform strategy to product roadmaps. Long term technical leadership in order to align market needs to roadmap development
* Acting as a mentor and support for software engineers, fostering a culture of continuous learning and development.
* Representing the software stack's technical solutions to both internal stakeholders and external customers, ensuring clear communication and alignment.


Your Profile


We are looking for a driven and experienced professional with a strong background in software development and product management. You should have a passion for solving complex problems and a deep understanding of both technology and business needs.


Key qualifications include:

* A degree in Engineering, Computer Science, or a related field, with a strong focus on software development.
* Proven experience in product management, software development, or a similar role.
* Excellent analytical and leadership skills, with the ability to work both independently and as part of a team.
* Strong communication skills in Swedish and English, both written and verbal.
* Experience with software development methodologies, requirements management, and technical documentation.
* A genuine interest in technology and a customer-centric approach.
* Passion for innovation, both regarding technology and business models
* Experience from the defense or aerospace industry.
* Experience from any of the following technical fields:
	+ High-performance computing (HPC),
	+ Cloud and virtualization technologies,
	+ Cybersecurity and information assurance.


We value diversity in our team and place importance on both your competencies and who you are as a person. If you are passionate about driving innovation and have the skills to lead our software stack to new heights, we want to hear from you.


This position requires that you pass a security vetting based on the current regulations around/of security protection. For positions requiring security clearance additional obligations on citizenship may apply.


What you will be part of


Behind our innovations stand the people who make them possible. Brave pioneers and curious minds. Everyday heroes and inventive troubleshooters. Those who share deep knowledge and those who explore sky-high. And everyone in between.


Joining us means making an impact together, contributing in our own unique ways. From crafting complex code and building impressive defence and security solutions to simply sharing a coffee with a colleague, every action counts. We encourage you to take on challenges, to create smart inventions and grow in our friendly and tech-savvy workspace. We have a solid mission to keep people and society safe.


Saab is a leading defence and security company with an enduring mission, to help nations keep their people and society safe. Empowered by its 25,500 talented people, Saab constantly pushes the boundaries of technology to create a safer and more sustainable world.


Saab designs, manufactures and maintains advanced systems in aeronautics, weapons, command and control, sensors and underwater systems. Saab is headquartered in Sweden. It has major operations all over the world and is part of the domestic defence capability of several nations. Read more about us here

*Kindly observe that this is an ongoing recruitment process and that the position might be filled before the closing date of the advertisement.*
company_description: Saab serves the global market with world-leading products, services and solutions from military defense to civil security.

title: SP Driver
description:
Stockholm,Stockholm,Sweden
Job ID**768812**
Join our Team
**About this opportunity:**


5G and Cloud RAN are already a reality, and Ericsson is a leader in bringing these technologies to market. There has never been a better time for you to make your mark. A large group of skilled professionals is working energetically to turn 5G and Cloud RAN plans into reality. We are now seeking additional talent.

  

Our unit is part of RAN SW & Compute Platforms within BA Networks and is responsible for driving end-to-end Baseband software product development, with the expertise and capability to take full ownership of features.

  

As a technical leader, you will guide teams in developing 5G Baseband and Cloud RAN software products. The teams develop advanced signal-processing functions and algorithms within a cycle- and memory-constrained real-time environment. The test environment includes both simulated setups and true end-to-end scenarios, involving the Core Network, Radio Access nodes, and real or simulated mobile phones.

  

The Solution Package Driver (SP Driver) acts as a technical project manager responsible for leading a team to deliver a feature. Depending on the size of the project, one SP Driver may oversee one or multiple features. The team comprises development teams, test managers, study drivers, and other key talents required to deliver the feature end-to-end.

  

You will experience a truly collaborative and supportive environment with great colleagues. There are also significant opportunities to grow within your role and explore other roles.

  

Our unit RCE RAN Performance is primarily located across various sites in Sweden, Canada, China, and the US. This position is based at the Stockholm Kista site.

  

  

**What you will do:**

* Collaborate with cross-functional teams, systems, and programs to define project objectives, scope, and deliverables. The SP Driver holds overall responsibility for the content, timeline, and quality of the developed feature Solution Package (SP).
* Prioritize user stories within the feature SP.
* Lead the SP through all process milestones, from pre-study to final delivery.
* Support teams in committing to an end-to-end timeline for the items they undertake.
* Identify and mitigate risks and dependencies early.
* Facilitate effective communication among stakeholders to ensure transparency and alignment.
* Measure and report on project performance, making adjustments as needed to ensure success.

 **The skills you bring:**

* A strong combination of technical expertise, project management skills, and interpersonal abilities.
* Ability to break down and prioritize features into verifiable, deliverable user stories or smaller work packages.
* Excellent analytical skills to assess complex content and make informed decisions.
* Capability to understand detailed input requirements and grasp the main components of the technical software solution, which is essential to establish authority among senior software developers.
* Self-driven with a focus on overall results, including the ability to remove obstacles to ensure feature release.
* Highly developed interpersonal and communication skills.

  

Take the next step in your career— and let's grow together!

**Why join Ericsson?**

  

At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.

 **What happens once you apply?**
company_description: Do you want to be part of shaping the future? From making connectivity more accessible to the latest IoT solutions, you have an opportunity to be where it begins.

title: SMB Sales Specialist
description:
- Devoteam is a leading technology partner to Google Cloud, AWS, and Microsoft across EMEA. With 20+ years of successful Google Cloud implementations and a team of certified experts, we drive digital transformation across various industries.


At Devoteam, we champion a revolutionary "New Way of Work" that prioritises flexibility, personal growth, and joint success.

  
Drive Digital Transformation: Become a Mid-Market Cloud Advisor


* As a Cloud Advisor for Google Cloud and other cloud technologies at Devoteam, you will play a crucial role in expanding our footprint across the Nordics and DACH. You will be responsible for:
* Hunting for New Business: Identify and acquire new customers with a focus on medium-sized businesses, generating leads and building strong relationships with key decision-makers.
* Driving Revenue Growth: Develop and execute sales strategies to achieve ambitious targets, exceeding customer expectations and contributing to Devoteam's continued success with hyperscalers and ISVs.
* Mastering the Sales Cycle: Own the entire sales process, from initial contact and needs analysis to proposal development, negotiation, and closing deals.
* Building Long-Term Partnerships: Cultivate strong relationships with existing clients, identifying opportunities to expand our services and ensure their ongoing success in all areas of their technology procurement.

Staying Ahead of the Curve: Maintain a deep understanding of the evolving Cloud ecosystem, including new products, services, and market trends.  

  



Success Stories:
  

*"Joining Devoteam in the Nordics has been a transformative experience. The support from the local tech teams and the clear growth path have enabled me to consistently exceed my sales targets."*  

*— Aliha Mahmood, Junior Sales, Sweden*

*"Transitioning from Google to Devoteam has been a remarkable experience. The collaborative culture and unwavering commitment to innovation at Devoteam have empowered me to utilize my Google Cloud expertise to its fullest potential. Working with cutting-edge Google Cloud solutions here has significantly advanced my career and allowed me to deliver exceptional value to our clients."*  

*— Thomas Brunn, Sales Executive, Norway*

Territory


* You'll be working with startups and mid-market corporations across the Nordic or the DACH region, primarily digital natives.

  
* Proven Hunter: Demonstrated success in acquiring new customers and closing deals in the IT project business, with a focus on hyperscaler technologies.
* Solution-Oriented Mindset: Ability to understand client challenges and translate them into effective Cloud solutions.
* Strong Communication & Presentation Skills: Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to effectively articulate the value proposition of Cloud to C-level executives.
* Relationship Builder: A natural networker who can build rapport and establish trust with clients and internal stakeholders.
* Results-Driven: Highly motivated and results-oriented, with a strong work ethic and a commitment to exceeding expectations.
* Languages: Excellent written and spoken English skills are essential. Fluency in a Nordic language is a plus. In DACH fluent German is a requirement.

  
- Devoteam is committed to creating a diverse and inclusive workplace where everyone feels valued and respected. We encourage applications from individuals with diverse backgrounds and experiences.
  

  

Benefits:



	* Flexible Work Arrangements: Enjoy a hybrid work model with the freedom to choose your working hours and location.
	* Career Development: Access to the Devoteam Academy for certified training and language courses, supporting your professional growth.
	* International Opportunities: Explore potential career opportunities within our global network.
	* Vibrant Culture: Be part of a dynamic and supportive team with regular social events and team-building activities.

title: Konsult - Newsec Interim Solutions
description:
*Är du konsult inom fastighetsbranschen eller går i tankarna om att ta steget dit? Anslut dig till vårt konsultnätverk och ta del av spännande uppdragsmöjligheter!*
 Newsec Interim Solutions erbjuder kvalificerade och erfarna konsulter för tillfälliga uppdrag inom fastighetsbranschen. Vi har ett brett nätverk av kompetenta interimskonsulter som hjälper våra kunder med allt från projektledning och förvaltning till affärsutveckling och strategi.
   

  

 Med över 40 kontrakterade konsulter hos företag som Castellum, Vasakronan och Corem är vi specialiserade på lösningar inom fastighetsbranschen.
   

  

 Vi tillsätter uppdrag inom:
   

  

* Fastighetsförvaltning
* Uthyrning
* Management
* Etablering
* Projektledning
* Projektutveckling
* Ekonomi/controlling
* Hyresadministration


 Oavsett roll ser vi till att ha rätt konsult tillgänglig i rätt tid och vi arbetar för att vara det självklara valet för både kunder och konsulter.
   

  

**Hur arbetar vi?**
 Varje uppdrag är unikt och vi strävar efter att göra den bästa matchningen av konsult för att uppfylla det specifika behovet i din organisation. Vi kvalitetssäkrar våra konsulter genom intervjuer, bakgrundskontroll, tester samt referenstagning för att säkerställa hög standard och långsiktiga relationer med både våra konsulter och våra uppdragsgivare.
   

  

**Vill du bli en del av vårt konsultnätverk?**
 Vi söker efter dig som vill arbeta som konsult inom fastighetsbranschen och delar vår vision om att leverera högkvalitativa resultat. Som konsult ser vi att du är en prestigelös individ som trivs i en föränderlig miljö och snabbt kan sätta dig in i verksamheten och leverera. Du är även självgående och uppskattar att dela med dig av dina erfarenheter.
   

  

 Som uppdragspartner vill vi erbjuda dig som konsult kompetensutveckling, kunskapsutbyte och samhörighet. Därmed bjuder vi löpande in våra konsulter till bland annat gästföreläsningar, kurser och nätverksträffar. Bli en del av vårt nätverk så är du varmt välkommen att delta vid nästa tillfälle!
   

  

*Vi ser fram emot att lära känna dig och utforska de möjligheter som väntar. Tillsammans skapar vi framgångsrika interimslösningar inom fastighetsbranschen.*

title: AI Manager
description:
AI Manager
 



  





 Whitehall Resources are looking for an AI Manager. We have 3 roles available for an AI Manager, for an initial 3 month contract. Please see further details below.
 



  





**AI Governance Manager**
 - 3 days onsite in Stockholm / 2 days Remote working
 



 Responsibilities:
 



 - Ensure Customer’s GenAI platform, the Knowledge Agent (KA), lives up the standards in terms of internal governance requirements such as compliance, business requirements, finance.
 



 - Be responsible for KA lifecycle activities
 



 - Manage stakeholders and internal governance tools.
 



  





 Skill and Experience:
 



 - Application ownership and/or provider-ship experience
 



 - Stakeholder management skills
 



 - Experienced in working in large corporate IT
 



 - AI experience
 



  





  





**AI Demand Manager**
 - 3 days onsite in Stockholm, Copenhagen, or Helsinki / 2 days Remote working
 



 Responsibilities:
 



 - Develop governance framework and processes for collecting, curating, prioritizing and overseeing AI demand across Nordea
 



 - Work together central team on embed ai demand into Customer’s org
 



 - Manage stakeholders from business units and internal functions
 



 - Operationalize and run demand management within central team
 



 - Prepare decision material related to prioritization and communication
 



  





 Skill and Experience:
 



 - Experience in AI development and implementation
 



 - Understanding of AI in the context of a large enterprise
 



 - Experience from leading role in large scale initiatives
 



 - Experience with senior stakeholder interaction
 



 - Good analytical and presentation skills
 



  





**AI Regulatory Implementation Manager**
 - 3 days onsite in Stockholm, Copenhagen, or Helsinki / 2 days Remote working
 



 Responsibilities:
 



 - Drive work related to identify and assess gaps between current governance frameworks and requirements under AI Act and other external regulations
 



 - Work together with senior stakeholders in first line of defence to align proposals and implementation activities
 



 - Engage with second line senior stakeholders to anchor implementation activities
 



 - Develop implementation roadmap and ensure execution of activities in alignment with AI Act milestones
 



 - Create awareness and training material and run sessions
 



 - Prepare decision material
 



  





 Skill and Experience:
 



 - Solid understanding of AI Act and other relevant regulation impacting AI initiatives in a large bank
 



 - Experience in driving high profile initiatives in large enterprise settings
 



 - Experience from driving regulatory programs and projects
 



 - Experience from interacting with senior stakeholders and getting to common agreements

title: Cyber Security, TARA
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting, Financial Services, and Information Services
description:
Cyber Security, TARA
 



 Cyber Security
 



 Sweden Gothenburg
 



 10 &Above
 



 English
 



 Onsite
 



 6 Months
 



  





  





 As CS Solution Architect you will focus on technical aspects of security solutions like PKI, IDS, Secure boot and work with conceptual CS solutions and architectural topology, writing cybersecurity attribute requirements and provide guidelines for allocation of requirements on ECU level. You will also execute the vehicle TARA by considering E/E architect and project topology, exposed interfaces to vehicle, system and components, drive the project from cybersecurity point of view, define CS project time plan, coordinate, and drive the project with affected stakeholders and ensure deliveries according to the overall time plan in project.

 Previous experience of working as
 **CS engineer or CS architect with focus on embedded engineering** 
 .
 



 Knowledge within cybersecurity requirement system engineering
 



 Knowledge of TARA execution.
 



 Knowledge of connected communication technologies (CAN, Ethernet)

 Familiar with Vector solutions within cybersecurity.Previous experience of working with type approval for R155? Previous experience of working as CS engineer or CS architect with focus on embedded engineering.
 



 Knowledge within cybersecurity requirement system engineering
 



 Knowledge of TARA execution.
 



 Knowledge of connected communication technologies (CAN, Ethernet)
 



 Documented experience of writing cybersecurity requirement based on common practices.? Good knowledge of PKI (both Onboard (Vehicle/ ECU level) and Offboard (Cloud)) + Key Management System
 



 Experience in developing and/or designing CS solutions specially SecOC on J1939 and LIN is a plus.
 



 Familiar with Vector solutions within cybersecurity.

title: Product Manager AWS
description:
G+D makes the lives of billions of people around the world more secure. We shape trust in the digital age with built-in security tech in three segments: Digital Security, Financial Platforms and Currency Technology. We have been a reliable partner for our customers for over 170 years with our innovative solutions for SecurityTech! We are an international technology group and traditional family business with over 14,000 employees in 40 countries. Creating Confidence is our path to success. Trust is the basis of our collaboration within G+D.
   

  

 We are the reliable partner for all challenges resulting from the Internet of Things. We offer a complete connectivity portfolio for mobile network operators, automotive manufacturers, technology companies such as chip and module manufacturers as well as transport and logistics providers. Our portfolio includes highly secure solutions in the area of connectivity & IoT, from classic SIM, eSIM and iSIM, to the associated embedded operating systems and life cycle management, through to services for global connectivity and IoT solutions. Do you want to actively shape the digital transformation with us?
   

  

 Give yourself an outstanding opportunity to develop and form your career in a dynamic and international environment. We are now looking for an Product Manager with focus on cloud transformation in AWS to join us at G+D Mobile Security for a permanent position based in Stockholm.
   

  

 Join our team to lead cutting-edge B2B software solutions trusted by global leaders in telecom, automotive, and IoT. As Product Manager AWS, you’ll shape the future of digital services by driving cloud transformation and scalable product strategies on AWS. Your expertise in AWS migrations will be key to delivering innovative, cloud-native solutions that set industry standards.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
 We are looking for a Product Manager with strong AWS expertise, cloud migration experience, and knowledge of IoT and eSIM technologies to drive transformational projects and optimize our cloud infrastructure. In this role you will be responsible for:
   

  

* Leading the product lifecycle from ideation to launch, ensuring seamless transitions.
* Innovate business models for new digital offerings and support it with business cases.
* Craft and execute product strategies that drive sustainable growth.
* Transform business vision into product reality by understanding market dynamics and customer needs.
* Design product concepts, manage backlogs, develop roadmaps, and coordinate agile plans with cross-functional teams.
* Prioritize and review requirements to ensure market acceptance and customer value.
* Drive successful product development and growth initiatives to meet market, technical, financial and schedule requirements.


**Qualifications**
 We are looking for a dynamic leader with exceptional communication skills and a strong commercial mindset. In this role, you will guide the team into the cloud environment, which includes inspiring and motivating others, delivering presentations, and staying attuned to market trends. A deep understanding of AWS is essential, as the role has a strong focus on cloud technologies. Moreover, you need to have:
   

  

* University or Master's degree in Engineering, Economics, or Computer Science.
* Experience in Product Management or related roles in Software Engineering or Solution Architecture within IT, Software, or Telecommunications.
* Proven experience in product management for B2B software solutions
* Expertise in AWS Marketplace and also other major cloud providers
* Proficiency in Business English


 It is extra good if you have:
   

  

* Cloud provider certifications in AWS
* Experience using AI in a business context


 Do you want to contribute to build the future for a seamless and connected society? Then apply today!
   

  

**What can we offer you?**
 In this role you will have the opportunity to work with talented people in an international and innovative environment. G+D is a well-established family-owned company at the forefront of the market. Besides a dynamic and evolving industry, we offer you:
   

  

* Annual wellness allowance of 4500 SEK
* Three additional days off per year
* Weekly sport activity hour
* Collective agreement
* Access to the Benify Portal for health activities and discounts
* Skandia health insurance
* Vacation exchange program
* Hybrid office model with the option to work 50% from home
* Weekly breakfast at the office


 Get to know us and our team at G+D Sweden better by listening to our Jobcast below:Shaping the next chapter of the digital ageSpotify: https://open.spotify.com/episode/71GyhbDv090LgVyukyLf7v?si=f399b1f0d93e47e3
   

  

 Acast: https://shows.acast.com/5cdc00c69e126b7939fb506b/646e072f95211700118d82a4Our DNA is in our peopleSpotify: https://open.spotify.com/episode/6BpWiUCMXr3q68dSGEr2w7?si=e4328a3c8db34b8d
   

  

 Acast: https://shows.acast.com/5cdc00c69e126b7939fb506b/646e070580b8d100110f0e95

title: Data Analyst (1-year fixed-term position)
description:
**Team:** 
 Subscription Data Enablement (under News Media, Subscription)
 **Work location: Oslo or Stockholm**
**About the team** 
 Subscription Data Enablement holds the commercial analytics mandate for all Schibsted brands (VG, Aftenposten, E24, Bergens Tidende, Stavanger Aftenblad, SvD, Aftonbladet and more). We build best-in-class data capabilities, democratize insights, and develop ML models to create personalized subscriber experiences. Our mission is to drive engagement and increase customer lifetime value through data-driven decision-making.
   

  

**What will you do**
 As a member of our Analytics team—working alongside Analysts, Data Engineers, and Data Scientists—you will:
   

  

* Perform advanced analysis: Work under guidance to apply statistical and machine-learning techniques to derive insights from customer and behavioral data
* Ensure data governance: Help establish processes that guarantee data accuracy, integrity, and security
* Collaborate cross-functionally: Partner with marketing, product, and commercial teams to identify data needs and translate findings into clear recommendations
* Build dashboards & reports: Create interactive dashboards in Tableau to enable stakeholders across brands to explore key metrics
* Model data with dbt: Assist in developing and maintaining data models using dbt to support scalable, self-service analytics and consistent business definitions across teams


**What we offer**
 At Schibsted, you’ll join a hybrid, informal, and collaborative workplace in one of the Nordic region’s most forward-looking media companies. You’ll be part of one of Scandinavia’s largest data communities, where knowledge sharing and personal development are highly valued. We offer competitive employee benefits, clear career paths within the Schibsted Group, and free digital subscriptions to all our news brandsts, clear career paths within Schibsted.
   

  

 ,
   

  

**Who you are**
* You hold a degree in Economics/Finance, Computer Science, Statistics/Mathematics, Engineering, or equivalent experience
* 1–3 years of hands-on experience in analytics, data science, or business intelligence (commercial/customer-centric focus is a plus)
* Strong proficiency in SQL
* Experience with Tableau or Power BI
* Familiarity with cloud-based analytics platforms is appreciated
* You’re a curious problem-solver who communicates technical concepts clearly to both technical and non-technical audiences
* You enjoy teamwork and thrive in a fast-paced, data-driven environment

title: Infrastrukturarkitekt
description:
Vill du vara med och forma framtidens digitala samhälle? Nu har du chansen att kliva ombord på vår resa mot en innovativ och digitaliserad framtid, där vi inte bara stärker it-tjänster och drift för våra egna system utan även för andra statliga myndigheter. Vi bygger en ny dynamisk enhet full av kompetens och engagemang, och vi vill att du ska vara med och göra skillnad. Är du redo att vara en del av något stort? Var med och gör samhället möjligt!
   

  

**Om jobbet**
 Som infrastukturarkitekt hos oss får du en central roll i att driva den tekniska utvecklingen framåt. Du kommer att arbeta med infrastrukturarkitektur, vara länken mellan teknik och verksamhet samt vägleda utvecklingsteam och beslutsfattare mot framtidens lösningar. Ditt fokus kommer ligga på infrastrukturtjänster, där du blir en viktig del av vårt arkitektteam inom Stödjande Tekniska Tjänster (STT). Du trivs med att växla mellan strategiskt, taktiskt och operativt arbete, och du har förmågan att både se helheten och dyka ner i tekniska detaljer. Din insats kommer direkt bidra till Skatteverkets övergång till en informationsdriven och digitaliserad verksamhet.
   

  

 Vi arbetar agilt och i tätt samarbete mellan it och verksamheten för att skapa utvecklingsvärdeströmmar. Vår tekniska miljö är bred och i ständig utveckling, med steg mot moderna lösningar som privata molntjänster, mikrotjänstarkitektur och containerteknik. På vår förändringsresa hanterar vi både nya och äldre teknologier, vilket ställer krav på att du behärskar flera arkitekturstilar parallellt.
   

  

 Hos oss får du möjlighet till ständig utveckling och lärande i arbetet. Vi jobbar aktivt med kompetens- och teknikutveckling. Du har pålitliga, ödmjuka och kunniga kollegor som du utbyter erfarenheter med och du kan utveckla både bredd och spets hos oss. Tack vare att vi är en stor it-organisation kan vi erbjuda goda möjligheter till intern rörlighet. Det är viktigt för oss att du har balans mellan jobb och fritid och vi erbjuder bland annat flexibel arbetstid och möjlighet att jobba delvis hemifrån. Du får en friskvårdstimme i veckan och friskvårdsbidrag.
   

  

 Här kan du läsa mer om hur det är att jobba med it hos oss och ta del av vad några av våra medarbetare berättar om sina jobb: Jobba med it hos oss
   

  

 Du tillhör it-avdelningen, med placering i Sundbyberg.
   

  

**Om dig**
 För att göra ett bra jobb och trivas hos oss på Skatteverket behöver du vara lyhörd, tänka nytt och ta ansvar. I arbetet är gott omdöme och förståelse för rättssäkerhet och säkerhet viktigt. Du ska också leva upp till vår medarbetarpolicy.
   

  

 I det här jobbet ska du:
   

  

* ha god samarbetsförmåga, vara hjälpsam och ha ett gott bemötande
* ha förmågan och viljan att lära dig nya saker, vara flexibel och öppen för förändringar
* ha god problemlösningsförmåga, se mönster och kunna göra avgränsningar
* vara målfokuserad och bidra till att syftet med verksamheten uppnås
* agera medvetet och professionellt utifrån en god självinsikt
* uttrycka dig väl i tal och skrift på svenska.


 Du ska även ha:
   

  

* högskoleutbildning inom it som arbetsgivaren bedömer relevant för rollen
* flerårig aktuell och relevant arbetslivserfarenhet inom infrastrukturarkitektur
* aktuell erfarenhet av privata mjukvarudefinierade datacenter (SDDC)
* grundläggande kunskap i modern säkerhetsarkitektur
* vana att leda och stötta andra arkitekter och team i arkitekturella förändringar.


 Det är önskvärt att du har dokumenterad arbetslivserfarenhet av arbete inom komplexa it-organisationer, t ex myndighet eller annan stor organisation. Det är också önskvärt med flerårig aktuell arbetslivserfarenhet i agil utveckling och användning av modeller för att analysera och dokumentera arkitektur.
   

  

**Bra att veta**
 Anställningen är tillsvidare och kan inledas med provanställning i sex månader.
   

  

 En anställning hos oss kan innebära placering i säkerhetsklass. En säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) kan därför komma att genomföras före beslut om anställning. För en del av våra arbetsuppgifter i säkerhetsklass krävs svenskt medborgarskap.
   

  

 På skatteverket.se/jobb kan du exempelvis läsa om vår samhällsbärande roll, fördelarna med att jobba hos oss och hur det går till när du söker våra jobb.
   

  

 När du ansöker bifogar du ditt cv. Vi använder inte personligt brev i våra rekryteringar och du ska därför inte bifoga det i din ansökan.
   

  

 Välkommen med din ansökan!
   

  

 Skatteverket har en samhällsbärande roll. Vårt arbete berör alla privatpersoner och företag och genom vårt uppdrag bidrar vi till ett väl fungerande samhälle. Vår utveckling är kunddriven och vi samverkar med andra för att skapa effektiva lösningar. Tillsammans gör vi samhället möjligt.
   

  

 Anställningsform: tillsvidareanställning | Anställningens omfattning: heltid | Antal lediga befattningar: 1 | Sysselsättningsgrad: 100% | Ort: Sundbyberg | Län: Stockholms län | Land: Sweden | Referensnummer: 2025/573 | Kontakt: Jerker Moberg, Sektionschef jerker.moberg@skatteverket.se, Therese Schönbeck, HR-specialist therese.schonbeck@skatteverket.se, | Facklig företrädare: Jeanette Forsgren, ST jeanette.forsgren@skatteverket.se, Göran Sundwall, Saco goran.sundwall@skatteverket.se, | Publicerat: 2025-07-21 | Sista ansökningsdag: 2025-08-11

title: Salesforce Technical Lead
description:
**Job Title: Salesforce Technical Lead (Contract)** 




**Location: Stockholm, Sweden (Hybrid)** 




**Contract Length: 12 months (Contract-to-Hire)** 




**Start Date: 31st March 2025** 




**Rate: DOE** 




  





 My customer in the Financial Services industry is seeking an experienced
 **Salesforce Technical Lead** 
 to join their team on an initial 12 months contract to go permanent. You will play a key role in customizing and developing the Salesforce platform to meet business requirements, ensuring optimal integration with other systems, and working on the early phases of a major implementation project.
 



  





 As part of a cross-functional team, you will collaborate closely with business stakeholders, product owners, and technical leads to drive innovation and efficiency in our Salesforce environment.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Develop and customize the Salesforce platform to align with business needs.
* Optimize Salesforce integrations with external systems using REST/SOAP APIs.
