***This is a Contract-to-hire opportunity, transitioning to a permanent role after 12 months.***




  





 Please reach out to
 ***Daniel Indranathan***
 if interested.

title: Enterprise Solutions Architect - Stockholm
description:
The customer platform built to acquire, service and grow lifelong customers.
   

  

**About Planhat:** 
 Planhat is reimagining how businesses grow with their customers. Our cutting-edge Customer Platform empowers B2B teams to manage success, revenue, and relationships through one intelligent, flexible interface. We help companies unlock the full potential of their customer data—powered by automation, analytics, and AI. If you thrive at the crossroads of technology and strategic impact, we want to hear from you.
   

  

**The Opportunity:**
 We’re looking for a forward-thinking
 **Enterprise Solutions Architect** 
 to join our global team. In this role, you’ll help our most strategic customers harness Planhat’s capabilities—including AI-driven automation, customizable workflows, and advanced data modeling—to transform how they manage the customer journey.
   

  

**This isn’t account management.** 
 It’s solution architecture. It's a technical strategy. It’s enabling companies to scale with intelligence. Future proofing the way they interact with their data in Planhat.
   

  

**What You’ll Do:**
* Lead with Innovation: Architect sophisticated solutions for customer success teams using Planhat’s AI-powered workflows, smart alerts, and automation features.
* Be the Strategic Technical Partner: Build deep, trusted relationships with enterprise customers, advising on how to embed Planhat into their tech stack and business processes.
* Own the Technical Lifecycle: From onboarding to maturity, ensure technical success and product adoption through seamless integrations, troubleshooting, and optimization.
* Drive Intelligent Automation: Help customers leverage Planhat’s native automation engine and AI insights to streamline processes, detect churn risk, and drive renewals.
* Manage a Strategic Portfolio: Oversee a book of enterprise clients with complex requirements—tracking technical health, engagement trends, and roadmap alignment.
* Influence Product & AI Capabilities: Act as the voice of the customer to our product and AI teams—bringing real-world insights that help shape the evolution of the platform.


**You Might Be A Fit If You:**
* Have 5+ years in a technical customer-facing role (TAM, Solutions Architect, Solution/Sales Engineer, Integration Lead) in SaaS, ideally with data-heavy or AI-enabled platforms.
* Are comfortable working with APIs, webhooks, JSON, data pipelines, and custom integrations (experience with tools like Salesforce, HubSpot, Snowflake, Looker, etc.).
* Can diagnose complex technical issues and explain solutions clearly to non-technical stakeholders.
* Are excited about the power of AI to transform workflows and decision-making—and you know how to make that real for customers.
* Have a proactive, consultative mindset—you’re not solving tickets, you’re designing outcomes.
* Digging under the “hood” is second nature to you. You’re a natural problem solver who takes initiative, dives deep into the unknown, and leaves no stone unturned when uncovering solutions, identifying recurring issues, and creating helpful resources for clients
* Bonus: You’ve worked with CRM or customer data platforms before.


**Why Join Planhat?**
* Shape the future of intelligent customer management at one of the most innovative platforms in the SaaS space.
* Collaborate with a global team of passionate builders and thinkers.
* Work for a product-led company that leads with innovation
* Competitive salary, equity options, and flexible working conditions.
* Build long-term relationships with forward-thinking customers who want to innovate, not just maintain.

title: Solution Architect - Assortment Planning
description:
**Job Description**
**WHAT YOU WILL DO:**
 We are now recruiting a Solution Architect for our Assortment Planning Value Stream within Business Tech. This is a key strategic role focused on shaping scalable, modular, and data-driven solutions for the future of planning and quantification.
   

  

 As Solution Architect, you will lead the technical architecture for several business-critical capabilities, including Assortment Building, Sales and Context Planning, and Assortment Quantification (ASQ). You will work closely with Product Owners, Engineers, Enterprise Architects, and other stakeholders to ensure system- and domain-level alignment.
   

  

 This role requires a combination of hands-on architecture execution, strategic thinking, and governance leadership. You will play a central part in delivering transformation initiatives aligned with our enterprise roadmap and capability-based planning model.
   

  

**You will:**
* Translate strategic business needs into scalable, modular, and service-based architectures.
* Lead the architecture for domains such as Planning Article, ASQ Quantify, and AI/ML-enabled orchestration.
* Align with enterprise architecture principles, target states, and capability roadmaps.
* Define and maintain architectural principles, guardrails, and decision-making frameworks.
* Own and evolve version-controlled Architecture Decision Records (ADRs).
* Ensure conformance to integration standards (event-driven, API-first, asynchronous messaging).
* Drive structured architectural documentation using PlantUML, C4 Model, and BPMN.
* Support continuous capability modelling and architectural governance.
* Drive the reduction of technical debt and improve the resilience and scalability of systems.
* Ensure ESG compliance and sustainable design principles in architecture.
* Mentor tech leads to promote architectural maturity.
* Facilitate architectural clarity across cross-functional teams and transformation initiatives.
* Balance architectural elegance with pragmatic, value-driven decisions that prioritize delivery efficiency and business impact.


**Who You Are**
*We are looking for people with..*
* 8+ years of experience designing and implementing large-scale systems.
* Proven experience in solution architecture within cloud-native and microservices environments.
* Deep expertise in Microsoft Azure, particularly Azure Container Apps, Event Grid, etc.
* Proficiency in architectural modelling (PlantUML, C4 Model, BPMN or equivalent) and documentation tooling.
* Hands-on experience in CI/CD, GitHub Actions, and infrastructure as code.
* Strong communication skills with the ability to explain complex concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
* Knowledge of security, privacy, and compliance-by-design principles.
* Experience working across federated, multi-team environments in a scaled agile setup.
* Demonstrated ability to drive cost-conscious design decisions across infrastructure, data, and integration layers.
* Strong judgment in balancing technical ambition with delivery velocity and resource constraints.
* Values direct, structured feedback and communicates with clarity and precision across teams.


**Good to Have:**
* Experience with enterprise-level planning and quantification systems.
* Domain knowledge in Retail, Supply- , or Assortment Planning.
* Exposure to Backstage, Git submodules, and ADR tooling.
* Strong understanding of capability modelling and domain-driven design (DDD).
* Advanced understanding of integration technologies such as Kafka, Solace, and Azure API Management.
* Experience with graph and document stores such as Neo4j and MongoDB.
* Integration testing using Testcontainers or similar frameworks.
* Familiarity with ESG-aligned architecture practices.
* Experience in data platform, AI/ML system integration, or decision intelligence.
* Understanding of cost transparency, observability, and system telemetry.
* Experience in defining transition architectures and long-term target states.


**Additional Information**
**WHO WE ARE**
 H&M Group is a global company of strong fashion brands and ventures. Our goal is to prove that there is no compromise between exceptional design, affordable prices, and sustainable solutions. We want to liberate fashion for the many, and our customers are at the heart of every decision we make.
   

  

 We are made up of thousands of passionate and talented colleagues united by our shared culture and values. Together, we want to use our power, our scale, and our knowledge to push the fashion industry towards a more inclusive and sustainable future. Read more about us here
   

  

**WHY YOU’LL LOVE WORKING HERE**
 At H&M Group, we are proud to be a vibrant and welcoming company. We offer our employees attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe.
   

  

 All our employees receive a staff discount card, usable on all our H&M Group brands in stores and online. Brands covered by the discount are H&M (Beauty and Move included), COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M HOME, & Other Stories, ARKET. In addition to our staff discount, all our employees are included in our H&M Incentive Program – HIP. You can read more about our H&M Incentive Program here.
   

  

**JOIN US**
 Our uniqueness comes from a combination of many things – our inclusive and collaborative culture, our strong values, and opportunities for growth. But most of all, it’s our people who make us who we are.
   

  

**Take the next step in your career together with us. The journey starts here.**

title: Senior IT Security Officer
description:
*Are you ready to shape the future of information security in a fast-paced and impactful role?*
 At Resurs, we’re on a mission to build a secure and resilient foundation for the future of fintech. As our Senior IT Security Officer, you’ll take on a pivotal role in protecting our business, customers, and data while raising awareness about information security across the organization.
   

  

**Get an idea of the role**
 Do you share our passion for securing cloud environments and staying ahead of evolving cyber threats? We’re looking for a Senior IT Security Officer with deep expertise in cloud-based infrastructure. In this role, you’ll report directly to the CISO and collaborate closely with our Enterprise Architecture team to shape and strengthen our security posture.
   

  

 Bring your experience, insight, and initiative - join us and let's stay ahead of tomorrow’s threats.
   

  

 As a Senior IT Security Officer you will...
   

  

* Perform threat modelling across the entire system architecture
* Document the security posture
* Develop a security risk management plan
* Advice on security solutions in cloud
* Support in security decisions regarding Network and IAM
* Evaluate security architectures and designs
* Determine the security controls needed
* Perform security reviews and identify gaps
* Take lead in the development of the cybersecurity architecture
* Employ secure configuration management processes


**Skillset And Experience**
 To thrive in this role, we believe you have experience in:
   

  

* Enterprise Cloud Security
* Network Security Architecture
* Identity Access Security Architecture
* Technology Awareness


 Meritorious:
   

  

* Knowledge in AWS security architecture and best practices
* Understanding of Infrastructure as code (IaC)
* Experience from Business Continuity in cloud
* Holder of CCSP, CISSP, CRISC or otherwise proven equivalent


**On a personal level**
 We are looking for someone with strong analytical and problem-solving abilities, who has excellent communication skills and the ability to explain technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders. You have an attention to details and a commitment to maintaining high security standards. You also..
   

  

* Have minimum of 5 years’ cyber security specialist working experience
* Have a University Degree in Cyber/Information security or equivalent
* Are fluent in English, both written and verbal (knowledge of Swedish is a plus)


**Resurs** 
**in brief**
 At Resurs, we make everyday finances easier through innovative and customer-focused solutions. With customers across the Nordics and more than 800 colleagues, we are committed to creating long-term value for individuals, businesses, and society. Recognized as a career company for the past six years, we put strong emphasis on both personal and professional growth. We want to make a difference by striving to be our best, acting with kindness, and building trust through clarity and collaboration. Our heart beats strong and it shows in everything we do.
   

  

 Although we are based in the Nordics, we are enriched by the breadth of perspectives brought by colleagues from different countries. We foster a welcoming and supportive culture, where collaboration drives us to achieve the best outcomes for our users.
   

  

**Apply today!**
 Don’t wait to send in your application. Selection and interviews take place on an ongoing basis, and the position may be filled before the last application date.
   

  

 We look forward to hearing from you!
   

  

**Important information**
**On final candidates, we carry out a detailed background check via an external company.**
* In this recruitment process, the supplier is solely responsible for the personal data they collect and process. Resurs is solely responsible for the personal data processed by us in the recruitment process.


 Resurs has almost 50 years of experience in retail finance and is one of the leading niche banks in the Nordics. We help companies and private individuals with lending, savings and payments. Today, we have a customer base of slightly more than 6 million customers and around 800 employees in the Nordic region.
   

  

 Follow us on Instagram:
   

  

 Resurs.Sverige
   

  

 Resurs.Norge
   

  

 Resurs.Suomi
   

  

 Resurs.Danmark

title: Must söker en senior lösningsarkitekt och it-specialist med fokus på säkerhet
description:
**Vill du ha ett meningsfullt arbete och bidra till ett säkrare Sverige i en osäker värld?**
 Det förändrade omvärldsläget medför att vårt försvar behöver förstärkas och den ökade underrättelseverksamheten mot Sverige och Försvarsmakten är omfattande. Militära underrättelse- och säkerhetstjänsten (Must) bedriver försvarsunderrättelseverksamhet och militär underrättelse- och säkerhetstjänst till stöd för svensk utrikes-, försvars- och säkerhetspolitik samt i övrigt för kartläggning av yttre hot mot Sverige.
   

  

**Vårt erbjudande** 
 Vi erbjuder ett viktigt och stimulerande arbete där du dagligen bidrar till Sveriges säkerhet. Vi erbjuder också mycket goda möjligheter till kompetensutveckling.
   

  

 Hos oss finns det friskvårdsmöjligheter som inkluderar träning tre timmar i veckan på arbetstid samt möjlighet till balans mellan fritid och arbete.
   

  

**Om tjänsten** 
 Systemavdelningen förstärks – vi söker en erfaren IT-specialist med stort teknikintresse och vana att utveckla, förvalta och etablera tekniska miljöer och system med höga säkerhetskrav.
   

  

 Vill du bidra till Musts operativa verksamhet och arbeta med teknik i framkant inom en samhällsviktig funktion? Då är detta rätt roll för dig.
   

  

**Huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter** 
 Som IT-specialist blir du en del av en bred och varierad IT-verksamhet där du ansvarar för förvaltning och utveckling av IT-tjänster med höga krav på säkerhet och separation.
   

  

 Dina arbetsuppgifter innefattar bland annat; lösningsarkitektur, systemutveckling och systemadministration, förvaltning och viss drift av olika IT-system, konfiguration och administration av nätverk samt arbete med virtualiseringslösningar.
   

  

 Du arbetar både självständigt och i team. Arbetsmetoden (agilt, vattenfall eller annan projektform) anpassas beroende på uppdragets karaktär och mål.
   

  

**Kvalifikationer**
* För tjänsten relevant utbildning eller motsvarande erfarenhet införskaffad på annat sätt som arbetsgivaren bedömer likvärdig.
* Minst fem års dokumenterad yrkeserfarenhet som IT-specialist eller lösningsarkitekt.
* Aktuell erfarenhet av Microsoft Windows server- och klientmiljö.
* Aktuell erfarenhet av nätverk och IT-infrastruktur.
* God förmåga att kommunicera på svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift.


**Meriterande**
* Erfarenhet av liknande arbete inom Försvarsmakten.
* Erfarenhet av PowerShell.
* Kunskaper i Cisco IOS (motsvarande ICND2).
* Erfarenhet inom virtualisering (t.ex. VMware eller Citrix).
* Erfarenhet av Ansible och Linux.
* Körkort för personbil (B-körkort).


**Personliga egenskaper** 
 Vi söker dig som har ett genuint teknikintresse och ett högt säkerhetsmedvetande. Du brinner för ditt område och har en stark motivation att ständigt lära dig mer, ta egna initiativ och lösa problem. Du arbetar väl såväl i grupp som på egen hand. Dokumentation, ordning och uppföljning är en naturlig del av ditt arbetssätt.
   

  

 Stor vikt kommer att läggas vid personlig lämplighet.
   

  

 Ovan ställda kvalifikationer ska på begäran kunna verifieras genom intyg, referenser samt arbets- eller urvalstester.
   

  

*För att myndighetens uppdrag ska vara framgångsrikt förutsätts att alla medarbetare uppträder enligt den värdegrund som finns. Försvarsmaktens värdegrund slår vakt om alla människors lika värde, rättvisa och jämlikhet och främjar demokrati och mänskliga rättigheter (läs mer på www.forsvarsmakten.se).*
**Övrigt** 
 Anställningsform: Tillsvidareanställning som inleds med provanställning om sex månader
   

  

 Tillträde: Enligt överenskommelse
   

  

 Arbetsort: Stockholm
   

  

**För upplysningar om befattningen eller rekryteringsprocessen kontakta:** 
 hkv-rekrytering-must@mil.se, vänligen skriv ”IT-specialist” i ämnesraden.
   

  

**Fackliga företrädare**
 Fackliga representanter nås via hkv-rekrytering-must@mil.se.
   

  

*Varmt välkommen med din ansökan senast 2025-09-09. I ditt CV och personliga brev vill vi att du beskriver på vilket sätt du uppfyller våra efterfrågade krav och meriter. Du ansöker via* 
*jobb.forsvarsmakten.se*
**Ansökningar till denna befattning kommer endast tas emot via Försvarsmaktens webbplats.** 
 -------------------------------------------------------- Militära underrättelse- och säkerhetstjänsten (Must) är en del av Försvarsmaktens högkvarter i Stockholm. Vi ger regeringen och Försvarsmakten kvalificerade beslutsunderlag om omvärldsutvecklingen och hot mot Sveriges och Försvarsmaktens säkerhet. Vår vision är ”Ett säkrare Sverige i en osäker värld”. Must är en kunskapsorganisation och erbjuder både spännande och för Sverige angelägna arbetsuppgifter. Här arbetar både officerare och civila experter inom olika områden, t ex statsvetenskap, IT, ekonomi, teknik, matematik och HR. En stor del av Must verksamhet omfattas av sekretess och vi ber dig därför att inte berätta att du sökt jobb hos Must för andra personer än dina närmaste. Läs gärna mer om Must och vår verksamhet här Varje dag och varje timme gör våra medarbetare insatser som påverkar andra människors liv, både i stort och smått, och både på hemmaplan och runt om i världen. Försvarsmakten ger dig möjlighet att utvecklas som människa och växa i din professionella roll. Vi är en ansvarstagande arbetsgivare och har en öppen organisation där vi ställer upp för varandra. I Försvarsmakten finns en stark värdegrund som bygger på öppenhet, resultat och ansvar. Professionell utveckling och personlig hälsa värdesätts och uppmuntras. Det finns goda förutsättningar för intern karriärrörlighet, friskvård och bra balans mellan arbete och privatliv. Försvarsmakten tillvaratar de kvaliteter som mångfald och jämn könsfördelning tillför verksamheten. Vi välkomnar därför sökanden med olika bakgrund och erfarenheter i våra rekryteringar. En anställning hos oss innebär placering i säkerhetsklass. Vanligtvis krävs svenskt medborgarskap. Säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll kommer att genomföras före anställning enligt 3 kap i säkerhetsskyddslagen. Med anställning följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras. I anställningen ingår även en skyldighet att tjänstgöra utomlands. Innebörden av detta varierar beroende på typ av befattning. Till ansökan om anställning ska CV och personligt brev bifogas. Om du går vidare i anställningsprocessen ska alltid vidimerade kopior av betyg och intyg uppvisas. Samtal från externa rekryteringsföretag och säljare undanbedes.

title: Presale Cybersecurity till Conscia!
description:
*Brinner du för cybersäkerhet och vill jobba i framkant hos en ledande aktör inom IT-infrastruktur och säkerhet? Vill du ta nästa kliv i karriären och bidra till utvecklingen av morgondagens säkerhetstjänster? Då kan rollen som Presale Security på Conscia vara helt rätt för dig!*
**Din Vardag**
 Som Presale Security blir du en viktig del av Conscias presalesteam – ett team med djup teknisk expertis där du samarbetar med både arkitekter och specialister. Tillsammans stöttar ni säljare och kunder genom att skapa relevanta och hållbara säkerhetslösningar.
   

  

 I takt med att cybersäkerhet blir alltmer kritiskt, satsar Conscia på att stärka sin marknadsposition och bredda sitt erbjudande för att möta kundernas ökande behov. I denna roll blir du en nyckelperson som hjälper till att driva utvecklingen av Conscias erbjudande inom cybersäkerhet.
   

  

 Du kommer att arbeta tätt med kunderna och fungerar som en strategisk rådgivare som kartlägger nuläge, identifierar behov och paketerar lösningar. Parallellt är du med och vidareutvecklar tjänsteutbudet inom exempelvis MDR, SOC, sårbarhetsanalyser och informationssäkerhet.
   

  

 I din roll kommer du även vara en naturlig kontaktpunkt för Conscias prisbelönta SOC lokaliserad i Slovenien som bland annat har en kraftfull Managed Detection & Response tjänst.
   

  

**Exempel på arbetsuppgifter:**
* Inspirera och vägled Conscias kunder inom cybersäkerhet genom workshops, utbildningar och föreläsningar
* Vara med i hela säljresan – från tidig dialog till lösningsförslag och implementation
* Bidra till att ta fram nya säkerhetstjänster och affärsförmågor
* Fungera som tekniskt bollplank och presale-stöd kring Conscias managerade säkerhetslösningar
* Hålla i kunddialoger, dokumentation och lösningsbeskrivningar
* Delta i marknadsinsatser såsom event, seminarier och innehållsproduktion
* Samverka med kollegor i andra länder inom Conscia-gruppen


**Vem är du?**
 För att lyckas i rollen som Cyber Security Architect tror vi att du flera års erfarenhet av arbete med cybersäkerhet och har ett starkt intresse utav området. Du drivs att hjälpa kunder och bygga långsiktiga relationer. Vidare har du meriterande certifikat inom området (CISSP eller motsvarade) samt att du talar och skriver svenska/engelska flytande.
   

  

 Som person är du trygg in din roll och van vid att agera rådgivare. Du trivs i en miljö där man delar med sig av sin kunskap. Vidare har du ett starkt självledarskap och tar ett stort ansvar i din roll.
   

  

**Kontakt**
*Vill du veta mer om jobbet, kontakta ansvarig rekryteringskonsult, Gustaf Linder, gustaf.linder@wiseit.se. Wise IT kan tyvärr inte ta emot ansökningar via mail, då vi värnar om din personliga integritet. Du kan läsa mer om hur vi behandlar personuppgifter enligt GDPR i* 
 Wise Group-koncernens policy för behandling av personuppgifter
 *. Urval sker löpande.* 
**Välkommen med din ansökan**
**Passar vi dig?**
 Conscia är en ledande europeisk systemintegratör med inriktning på säker IT-infrastruktur och managerade tjänster. Conscia är ett bolag som fokuserar starkt på kompetens och vi vill vara det naturliga valet när kunder vill ha en expert leverans.
   

  

 Conscia är en grupp som idag finns i Sverige, Norge, Danmark,Finland, England, irland Nederländerna, Tyskland, Slovenien och Belgien. Conscia som koncern har sitt huvudkontor i Köpenhamn.
   

  

 Våra tjänster består idag av både lokalt producerade och internationella gemensamma tjänster inom Consciagruppen. Inom cybersäkerhetsområdet arbetar Consciagruppen även med bland annat lösningar från Cisco, Splunk, Palo Alto, Microsoft, Elastic med flera.
   

  

 Vi är idag ca 115 anställda och är nu på jakt efter ytterligare en medarbetare som vill vara med i vår starka utveckling framåt. Vi på Conscia är snabbrörliga med familjekänsla och högt i tak, där allamedarbetare bidrar mycket aktivt i vår utveckling.
   

  

 Det svenska huvudkontoret huserar i mycket fräscha lokaler i DN-huset på Kungsholmen i Stockholm. Vi har även kontor i Borlänge, Göteborg, Malmö och Västerås.
   

  

 Läs gärna mer om Conscia Sverige i vår blogg.

title: Expert Data Scientist
description:
**Job ID: 27380**
 Are you ready to help shape the future of ML & AI at Scandinavia’s largest bank, working alongside a dynamic, fast-paced team? The Group AI Center of Excellence is an established unit within Group Technology focusing on delivering and enabling ML/AI use cases across the organization. The unit provides reusable ML/AI Assets that are developed in conjunction with business stakeholders to be leveraged by a wide variety of use cases.
   

  

 We are now looking for an Expert Data Scientist who is interested in working in the field of ML/AI with use-cases across the bank. You will work closely with data scientists, ML engineers, and business stakeholders to take AI applications from concept to production, ensuring they are developed in an ethical, safe, and sustainable way.
   

  

**About This Opportunity**
 Welcome to the Data science & Decisioning team. Your passion for working with people from both a technical and a business background, coupled with your curiosity for ML & AI and new innovations like Generative AI, makes you well-suited for this position. As Nordea pioneers its way into an ML/AI and Gen AI driven future, you will thrive by embracing a dynamic environment, fostering collaboration, and maintaining an open and adaptable mindset.
   

  

**What you will be doing:**
* As a data scientist, you will help to resolve data-intensive decisioning problems through application of data processing & modelling and contribute to driving intelligent automation through algorithmic & model-based solutions:
+ Design and build scalable, reliable ML/AI solutions, using existing assets & framework or creating something new from scratch
+ Collaborate and engage in discussions with stakeholders and colleagues related to requirements, data and methods for data manipulation to resolve broad spectrum of business problems
+ Ensure our ML/AI applications are developed from idea to production, meeting all necessary requirements for smooth and successful deployment
+ Engage and incorporate feedbacks by following the internal guidelines coming from model risk validation framework, legal or privacy teams. Engage in optimizing the code for further steps towards model deployment
+ Stay on top of cutting-edge technologies by exploring and recommending the latest and greatest AI methods, tools and services. Your insights will keep us ahead of the curve!


 Our AI team culture is built on collaboration, continuous learning and innovation. We foster an open environment where diverse ideas thrive, encouraging everyone to push the boundaries of technology while supporting each other's growth. With a strong focus on well-being, we prioritize work-life balance and encourage open communication.
   

  

 At Nordea, inclusion and diversity are at the heart of our values. We believe that a diverse workforce drives innovation, fosters creativity and creates a more supportive workplace for all. The role is based in Høje Taastrup, Helsinki, or Stockholm.
   

  

**Who You Are**
 Collaboration. Ownership. Passion. Courage. These are the values that guide us in being at our best – and that we imagine you share with us.
   

  

**To succeed in this role, we believe that you:**
* Embrace a growth mindset, where you enjoy taking initiative and bringing solutions
* Enjoy problem solving, and tackling challenges
* Are an awesome team member and you have a strong ability to inspire and collaborate with people to take action


**Your experience and background:**
* BSc, MSc or PhD in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Engineering Physics, relevant data science field
* 10+ years of experience in testing, maintaining, launching AI/ML products, working with MLOps best practices and DevOps environment (CI/CD pipelines, Docker, container orchestration)
* Experience in training, evaluation, fine-tuning and deployment of predictive models; including feature selection, hyper-parameter tuning, error analysis and data visualisation
* You’re a coding wizard in one or more data science programming language i.e. Python, Pyspark, SQL etc., and you know your ways around tools like IBM Watson (CP4D), BitBucket, Hive, Unix Systems, visualization tool such as PowerBI etc.
* Experience working with public cloud providers (AWS, Azure or GCP), especially their serverless, ML (e.g., AWS SageMaker), or data storage services as well as Infrastructure as Code (IaC)
* Skilled at transforming complex ideas into clear, engaging explanations—whether you're presenting to a technical team or breaking things down for non-experts


 If this sounds like you, get in touch!
   

  

**Next steps**
 We kindly ask you to submit your application as soon as possible, but no later than 17/08/2025. We will ongoingly be reviewing applications and conducting interviews as we receive them, and might close the recruitment process before the posting end date. Any applications or CVs sent by email, direct messages, or any other channel than our application forms, will not be accepted or considered.
   

  

 If you have any questions about the role or this recruitment process, please reach out to our tech recruiter and main point of contact Anna Dahlström, anna.dahlstrom@consult.nordea.com.
   

  

 At Nordea, we know that an inclusive workplace is a sustainable workplace. We deeply believe that our diverse backgrounds, experiences, characteristics and traits make us better at serving customers and communities. So please come as you are.
   

  

**Only for candidates in Sweden:** 
 For union information, please contact finansforbundet@nordea.se or SACONordea@nordea.com.

title: IT Service Manager Cyber Security & Identity till Rexel!
description:
*Vill du ta en nyckelroll i att bygga upp en modern IT-säkerhetsfunktion från grunden? Vill du kombinera teknik, strategi och förändringsledning i ett bolag med tydligt hållbarhetsfokus? Då kan du vara den vi söker till Rexel Sverige!*
**Din vardag**
 Som IT Service Manager Cyber Security & Identity tillhör du den svenska IT-organisationen och rapporterar till Head of IT Operations. Du samarbetar tätt med övriga Service Managers samt centrala delar av verksamheten såsom HR, Legal, Försäljning och Produkt. Rollen innebär också ett nära samarbete med Group IT:s säkerhetsteam, där du representerar den svenska IT-säkerhetsagendan.
   

  

 Som IT Service Manager Cyber Security & Identity har du ett tydligt mandat att vidareutveckla och bygga upp strukturen kring IAM och AD. Du etablerar ett ramverk för hur hantering av konton och åtkomster ska ske, utvecklar effektiva lösningar för onboarding och offboarding, samt ansvarar för att affärskritiska applikationer kopplas till SSO och sätta upp förvaltning för behörigheter kopplat till dessa.
   

  

 Du har även ett övergripande ansvar för att stärka organisationens förmåga inom cybersäkerhet. Det omfattar att säkerställa efterlevnad av regulatoriska krav och interna rutiner, stödja vid större incidenter, samt att förbereda organisationen inför framtida samarbete med extern SOC-leverantör.
   

  

 En viktig del av uppdraget är att öka det interna säkerhetsmedvetandet och bidra till en kultur där säkerhet integreras i det dagliga arbetet. Genom ett strukturerat arbetssätt, stark kommunikation och ett nära samspel med både verksamheten och IT bidrar du till att höja organisationens trygghet och motståndskraft i en snabbt föränderlig hotbild.
   

  

**Vem är du?**
 För att trivas i rollen som IT Service Manager Cyber Security tror vi att du har:
   

  

* Erfarenhet roller inom Cybersäkerhet med ansvar för Cybersecurity och Identity & Access Management
* Erfarenhet av att leda säkerhetsinitiativ och projekt i större organisationer.
* Utbildning inom relevant område eller motsvarande arbetslivserfarenhet
* Erfarenhet av ITIL ramverket
* Flytande i Svenska och engelska, båda tal och skrift


 Som person är du lyhörd, ödmjuk och tydlig. Du har lätt för att skapa förtroende, är lyhörd i dialog men står också tryggt i din kompetens när det behövs. Du bidrar till en öppen kultur genom att ge och ta emot feedback på ett respektfullt sätt.
   

  

**Kontakt**
 I denna rekrytering samarbetar Rexel Sverige AB med Wise IT. Vill du veta mer, kontakta ansvarig rekryteringskonsult Gustaf Linder på gustaf.linder@wiseit.se. Vi kan tyvärr inte ta emot ansökningar via mail då vi värnar om din personliga integritet. Du kan läsa mer om hur vi behandlar personuppgifter enligt GDPR i Wise Group-koncernens policy för behandling av personuppgifter.
   

  

 Processen kommer att starta i augusti.
   

  

**Om oss**
 Rexel är en av världens största leverantörer av energiteknik, med verksamhet i mer än 20 länder. Vi tror på att föra vår positiva energi till allt vi gör, och varje dag vägleder vi våra kunder genom de utmaningar de står inför för att göra installationer, infrastrukturer och byggnader mer bekväma, säkra och energieffektiva. Vi kopplar ihop och distribuerar morgondagens hållbara elvärld. Idag. Läs mer om Rexel på rexel.se och hur det är att arbeta med oss.
   

  

 Rexel. Elektrifierande lösningar som gör en hållbar framtid möjlig.

title: Software Architect - Frontend
description:
*We’re Tacton – a Swedish product company building powerful B2B solutions for manufacturers. We’re currently looking for a Frontend Architect to help lead the way in how we build, scale, and evolve the frontend of our CPQ SaaS platform.*
**About The Role**
 This role is central to our frontend strategy. You’ll drive architectural decisions across teams and take part in key initiatives - all while staying hands-on with development.
   

  

 You’ll work closely with a highly skilled team of developers and architects, supporting multiple initiatives at once. Our frontend is built mainly with TypeScript, JavaScript, Preact, and in-house frameworks, and we’re always looking for ways to modernise and improve.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Define and evolve the frontend architecture for our core product and platform.
* Write and review code regularly - staying close to the work and setting a strong technical example.
* Collaborate with product managers, designers, and developers to build solutions that are scalable, performant, and user-focused.
* Lead frontend initiatives across multiple teams, aligning direction and ensuring consistency.
* Evaluate and introduce new technologies and practices that strengthen our frontend development.
* Support system architecture decisions and help steer long-term frontend direction.
* Document technical decisions and make sure the “why” is clear to everyone.
* Contribute to improving our CI/CD processes and deployment workflows.


**Required**
**Skills & Qualifications**
* 7+ years of experience in frontend or fullstack development, ideally within a SaaS product company.
* Strong coding skills in JavaScript and TypeScript, with hands-on experience in modern frameworks (we currently use Preact).
* Experience guiding architectural decisions across teams or products.
* Familiarity with cloud environments (especially AWS).
* Skilled at fostering cross-functional collaboration and positively influencing outcomes without formal authority.
* Familiar with and curious about how AI can enhance both our products and processes
* Fluent in English; Swedish is a plus.
* On-site availability at our Stockholm office 3 days per week to support collaboration and knowledge sharing.


**Preferred**
* Experience with in-house or custom frontend frameworks.
* Understanding of CI/CD, build pipelines, and performance optimisation.
* Interest in contributing to broader architecture discussions, including fullstack systems.


**The Recruitment Process Consists Of**
* Screening call with Talent Acquisition
* Logics and personality test (Alva Labs)
* First interview with our hiring manager
* Technical interview/ case
* Interview with our CPO, CTO or COO
* Logical and personality online tests
* Reference check


**What We Offer**
 At Tacton, we’ve been building CPQ software for over 20 years. We’re a stable company with global customers and a product that’s central to how manufacturers sell.
   

  

 You’ll work with modern tools, alongside people who know the tech and the business. There’s room to grow, take ownership, and influence how we build and deliver software.
   

  

 We offer competitive benefits, flexibility in how we work, and a culture that values learning and collaboration.
   

  

 We look forward to your application; apply soon, as we review candidates on a rolling basis.
   

  

**About Tacton**
*Tacton is a leading Software as a Service company trusted by global manufacturers. We got started in the late 1990’s when six computer scientists figured out a revolutionary way to help Manufacturers overcome their most business-critical, product configuration challenges. Since those early days, we have grown to support global manufacturers seeking to thrive in a changing world.*
*We invite you to find out more about us @ www.tacton.com/about*
 Tacton is a leading SaaS company within CPQ and Design Automation making sales simple for complex products.

title: Lösningsarkitekt till HR IT
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting and Technology, Information and Internet
description:
Vill du vara med och forma framtidens HR-lösningar i en offentlig verksamhet? Som lösningsarkitekt på Arbetsförmedlingen får du en nyckelroll i arbetet med att utveckla hållbara IT-lösningar för myndighetens HR-funktioner. Vill du bli en av oss och tillsammans få Sverige i arbete?
   

  

**Sektionens uppdrag**
 Sektionen Personal & HR inom avdelningen Myndighetsgemensam IT ansvarar för produkter som stödjer myndighetens gemensamma funktioner inom HR och kommunikation. Vi säkerställer även effektiv informations- och datastyrning, tillgång till data och utvecklar datadrivna tillämpningar - från enkel rapportering till masterdatahantering. Genom våra produkter bidrar vi till att öka myndighetens inre effektivitet, med fokus på att förenkla och förbättra för alla medarbetare på myndigheten.
   

  

**Beskrivning av tjänsten**
 Vi söker en lösningsarkitekt med djup teknisk kunskap och erfarenhet av IT-utveckling. Som en del av Arbetsförmedlingens arkitekturstyrning blir du en nyckelperson för att säkerställa utvecklingen i linje med målarkitektur och gemensamma arkitekturprinciper som stödjer myndighetens digitala transformation.
   

  

 På Arbetsförmedlingen arbetar en lösningsarkitekt med att planera realiseringen av IT-lösningar baserat på verksamhetens behovsbild och med förutsättningar från existerande IT-tjänster i organisationen. För en fungerande och medveten arkitekturstyrning behöver lösningsarkitekten fokusera på lösningar som spänner över flera olika system och processer.
   

  

 Rollen kräver förmåga att arbeta på både taktisk och operativ nivå. Du anpassar arkitekturkoncept efter verksamhetens behov och bidrar till lösningar som skapar värde. Du har mycket god förmåga att arbeta både självständigt och tillsammans med andra, planerar och driver arbetet framåt för att nå resultat på ett prestigelöst sätt.
   

  

 Har du bred erfarenhet av arkitekturarbete i stora organisationer och kan omvandla verksamhetsbehov till IT-lösningar, då kan du vara precis den vi söker.
   

  

**Vårt erbjudande**
 Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning på heltid som kan komma att inledas med sex månaders provanställning med placering i våra fräscha och ljusa lokaler i Solna.
   

  

 Vi erbjuder dig möjligheten att arbeta på en arbetsplats där vi värdesätter balans mellan arbete och privatliv. Du får tillgång till ett generöst semesteravtal, flexibla arbetstider samt möjlighet att arbeta på distans upp till 49 procent på årsbasis. Hos oss ingår även friskvård under arbetstid och ett förmånligt friskvårdsbidrag.
   

  

 Som anställd på Arbetsförmedlingen har du också tillgång till kompetensutveckling och karriärmöjligheter inom myndigheten. Genom vårt arbete bidrar vi till ett inkluderande och hållbart samhälle, där du får möjlighet att göra en verklig skillnad för individer och för samhället i stort.
   

  

 Mer om att jobba hos oss
   

  

**Grundläggande krav för tjänsten**
* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av arbete med lösningsarkitektur i en större organisation.
* Erfarenhet av tekniska miljöer med blandning av egenutvecklade system och SaaS.
* Erfarenhet av att ha arbetat med agil utvecklingsmetodik.
* Relevant eftergymnasial teknisk utbildning inom till exempel datateknik, systemvetenskap, alternativt erfarenhet som arbetsgivaren bedömer likvärdig.
* Flytande kunskap i svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift.


**Övriga meriter för tjänsten**
* Erfarenhet av att ta fram framtidssäkrade IT-lösningar utifrån verksamhetsbehov, inklusive kunskap om systemintegration och arkitektur.
* Erfarenhet av att leda tekniska workshops och presentera lösningar.
* Certifierande arkitekturutbildning.
* Erfarenhet av arbete eller uppdrag inom statlig myndighet.


 Den statliga värdegrunden guidar oss i vårt dagliga arbete. Som anställd hos oss förväntas du arbeta rättvist, opartiskt och med hög integritet, samt bidra till att upprätthålla och stärka förtroendet för vår myndighet.
   

  

 Mer om statliga värdegrunden
   

  

 Utöver dessa kvalifikationer har du personlig förmåga och fallenhet att arbeta i enlighet med Arbetsförmedlingens medarbetarskap:
   

  

 Medarbetare på Arbetsförmedlingen:
   

  

* Tar ansvar för sina arbetsprestationer och sitt bidrag till helheten
* Anpassar sig till förändring och oförutsedda händelser
* Tar initiativ till utveckling och bidrar till förbättring


**Ansökan**
 Låter det här som en tjänst för dig? Välkommen med din ansökan senast
 **2025-09-01** 
 .
   

  

 Bifoga ditt CV där du specificerar årtal, månad och arbetsuppgifter för varje anställning, samt intyg som styrker kraven om utbildning och/eller arbetslivserfarenhet i din ansökan.
   

  

 Det är viktigt att du besvarar urvalsfrågorna detaljerat och sanningsenligt, för att vi ska få en tydlig bild av din erfarenhet. Om efterfrågad information inte framgår riskerar du bli bortsållad i urvalet. Du behöver inte skicka in ett personligt brev.
   

  

**I den här rekryteringen samarbetar vi med Experis.** 
**För ytterligare information eller vid frågor om tjänsten, vänligen kontakta rekryteringskonsult Pia Boström, 0703-14 68 66, pia.bostrom@se.experis.com.**
 Intervjuer kan komma att ske löpande. Under rekryteringsprocessen kan urvalstester förekomma. Vi kommer att hålla dig informerad genom hela rekryteringsprocessen. Mer om vår rekryteringsprocess.
   

  

 Har du skyddade personuppgifter kontaktar du den rekryteringspartner som finns namngiven i annonsen så får du hjälp med att skicka in din ansökan.
   

  

 Vi arbetar aktivt för att vara en myndighet fri från diskriminering. Det är viktigt för oss att all kompetens tas tillvara och vi välkomnar alla sökande. Vi ser positivt på om du har kunskaper i något av våra nationella minoritetsspråk.
   

  

**Välkommen till jobbet som får Sverige i arbete! Här arbetar du på regeringens uppdrag för en arbetsmarknad som hjälper människor framåt. Vi frigör möjligheter så att arbetssökande hittar sysselsättning och arbetsgivare sin nästa medarbetare. För att nå målet behöver vi samarbeta, i myndigheten men också med olika externa aktörer i hela landet. Tillsammans driver vi förändring, utvecklar nya arbetssätt och skapar lösningar som gör att Sverige kan fortsätta framåt.**
 Mer om vår organisation och vårt uppdrag.

title: Data engineering tech lead
description:
**About The Job**
 Are you passionate about building impactful SaaS products and driving technical innovation? Join us as a Technical Product Owner for iBOS Connect, where you'll lead the evolution of one of our key digital offerings in smart building connectivity.
   

  

 Nordomatic is a global leader within Smart Buildings. By combining our vast experience in system integration with visionary and innovative software solutions, we are pioneers in digitalizing building management. We aim to serve our customers, people, and planet better than yesterday. We reach our goals together by enabling a strong culture, developing people and skills, and in all that we do, we believe that the more we change today, the more we can impact tomorrow.
   

  

 Today, we are over 1000 specialists in 33 offices in nine countries. We are proud to say that we are one of the world’s leading independent BMS providers.
   

  

 Cloud and SaaS offer numerous opportunities for property owners to reduce energy consumption, enhance indoor air quality, and access essential data and analytics. Nordomatic Property Tech is a lean and agile software company with large ambitions! We deliver cloud solutions for properties around the globe, bringing together hardware and software solutions to help companies manage their BMS, Workplace, and Energy in the cloud.
   

  

 Join us on our mission to create an open and sustainable future!
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a Data Engineering Lead, you will join a small but highly skilled team of engineers. You'll work across the full stack of our products, with the majority of the focus dedicated to data operations, aggregation, representation, etc . Your contributions will significantly shape the data product, your leadership will have a daily influence on the team that you are about to guide and direct.
   

  

**Accountabilities**
* Bridge business needs with technical solutions by leading engineering team towards the defined roadmap.
* Own the technical vision of products and compile detailed technical designs, refining user stories with Product Owner.
* Optimize performance, mitigate risks, and ensure alignment to timelines and resources allocation.
* Contribute to Data & Software Engineering standards and best practices.
* Lead and mentor technical teams (Data Engineering, Cloud Engineering, Software Engineering) and work with AI/GenAI leads to foster collaboration and innovation.
* Ensure product stability, scalability, and simplicity while adhering to regulatory requirements and data security standards.
* Supervise technical leadership throughout the software development lifecycle and provide hands-on support in development, technical delivery, review, and testing while collaborating with global teams.


**Essential Skills/Experience**
* Minimum 7 years of experience in the design, development, and delivery of software and data engineering solutions.
* Extensive technical expertise in Data Engineering, Software Engineering, and Cloud Engineering.
* Strong foundational knowledge of AI Engineering principles and practices.
* Deep understanding of DevOps and DataOps methodologies with practical implementation experience.
* Demonstrated success in product development and/or product management, delivering complex solutions end-to-end.
* Demonstrable ability to provide technical thought leadership across Data, Analytics, and AI domains.
* Exceptional communication, customer management, and multi-functional collaboration skills.
* Robust analytical and problem-solving abilities with a collaborative, team-oriented approach.
* Hands-on experience driving innovation throughout the full product development lifecycle.
* Solid understanding of Data Mesh and Data Product concepts and architectures.
* Proficiency in Agile methodologies and facilitating iterative, multi-functional team delivery.
* Hands-on experience designing, implementing, and optimizing data pipelines using leading ETL tools.
* Skilled in architecting, deploying, and managing scalable, secure cloud environments.
* Practical experience implementing DataOps practices with tools like DataOps.Live.
* Strong expertise in data storage and analytics platforms.
* Ability to deliver actionable insights through business intelligence tools, including Power BI.
* Experience designing and deploying AI solutions.
* Hands-on implementation of AI/ML.
* Advanced programming skills, Java (Spring) & Python.
* Solid knowledge of both SQL and NoSQL database technologies.
* Familiarity with agile ways of working and iterative development environments.
* Experience working in large, multinational organizations or distributed environments is highly desirable.
* Demonstrated leadership and mentoring skills, with a demonstrable ability to develop high-performing technical teams.


**Desirable Skills/Experience**
* Bachelor's or master's degree in Software engineering, Data Management, IT, or a related field.
* Experience in the Property Tech industry
* Awareness of use case specific GenAI tools available in the market and their application in day-to-day work scenarios.


 When we put unexpected teams in the same room, we unleash bold thinking with the power to inspire life-changing prop tech solutions. In-person working gives us the platform we need to connect, work at pace and challenge perceptions. That's why we work, on average, a minimum of three days per week from the office. But that doesn't mean we're not flexible. We balance the expectation of being in the office while respecting individual flexibility. Join us in our unique and ambitious world.
   

  

 At Nordomatic, we are at a crucial stage of our journey to become a digital and data-led enterprise. Our commitment to innovation empowers us to make the impossible possible by building partnerships and ecosystems that drive scale and speed for exponential growth. With investment backing us all the way, we are focused on disrupting the industry while making a meaningful impact through our work. Here you'll find countless opportunities to learn, grow, and contribute to developing digital products that contribute to sustainability on a daily basis.

title: SP Driver
description:
**Join our Team**
**About this opportunity:**
 5G and Cloud RAN are already a reality, and Ericsson is a leader in bringing these technologies to market. There has never been a better time for you to make your mark. A large group of skilled professionals is working energetically to turn 5G and Cloud RAN plans into reality. We are now seeking additional talent.
   

  

 Our unit is part of RAN SW & Compute Platforms within BA Networks and is responsible for driving end-to-end Baseband software product development, with the expertise and capability to take full ownership of features.
   

  

 As a technical leader, you will guide teams in developing 5G Baseband and Cloud RAN software products. The teams develop advanced signal-processing functions and algorithms within a cycle- and memory-constrained real-time environment. The test environment includes both simulated setups and true end-to-end scenarios, involving the Core Network, Radio Access nodes, and real or simulated mobile phones.
   

  

 The Solution Package Driver (SP Driver) acts as a technical project manager responsible for leading a team to deliver a feature. Depending on the size of the project, one SP Driver may oversee one or multiple features. The team comprises development teams, test managers, study drivers, and other key talents required to deliver the feature end-to-end.
   

  

 You will experience a truly collaborative and supportive environment with great colleagues. There are also significant opportunities to grow within your role and explore other roles.
   

  

 Our unit RCE RAN Performance is primarily located across various sites in Sweden, Canada, China, and the US. This position is based at the Stockholm Kista site.
   

  

**What you will do:**
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams, systems, and programs to define project objectives, scope, and deliverables. The SP Driver holds overall responsibility for the content, timeline, and quality of the developed feature Solution Package (SP).
* Prioritize user stories within the feature SP.
* Lead the SP through all process milestones, from pre-study to final delivery.
* Support teams in committing to an end-to-end timeline for the items they undertake.
* Identify and mitigate risks and dependencies early.
* Facilitate effective communication among stakeholders to ensure transparency and alignment.
* Measure and report on project performance, making adjustments as needed to ensure success.


**The skills you bring:**
* A strong combination of technical expertise, project management skills, and interpersonal abilities.
* Ability to break down and prioritize features into verifiable, deliverable user stories or smaller work packages.
* Excellent analytical skills to assess complex content and make informed decisions.
* Capability to understand detailed input requirements and grasp the main components of the technical software solution, which is essential to establish authority among senior software developers.
* Self-driven with a focus on overall results, including the ability to remove obstacles to ensure feature release.
* Highly developed interpersonal and communication skills.


 Take the next step in your career—apply now and let's grow together!
   

  

**Why join Ericsson?**
 At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.
   

  

**What happens once you apply?**
 Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.
   

  

 Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. Learn more.
   

  

 We target 60% work-from-the office. Last day to apply is 22nd August 2025.
   

  

 Please note that we do not accept, proceed, or respond for applications sent via e-mail.
   

  

**Primary country and city:** 
 Sweden (SE) || Stockholm

title: Systems Consultant –Oracle HCM to Dovista
description:
If you have experience with international HRIS implementations, a passion for IT as a business enabler, and a strong technical background – we would love to hear from you!
   

  

 DOVISTA is now looking for a Systems Consultant to join the Digital Business Solutions team and play a key role in the implementation and long-term development of our new HR system.
   

  

**Your daily work**
 As a Systems Consultant, you will support the implementation of Oracle HCM – both strategically and hands-on. You will act as an expert in technical HR development, integrations, and configuration, shaping how the new system supports the business across the DOVISTA group.
   

  

 You will work in a cross-functional team, collaborating with HR, IT, external partners, and colleagues across Europe. The role also includes further development, optimization, and maintenance of the system post-implementation.
   

  

**Your responsibilities include:**
* Design, configure, and implement Oracle HCM solutions and related applications within the ecosystem
* Act as the owner of HR solutions – continuously challenging and improving existing processes and setups
* Conduct needs analysis and translate business requirements into effective technical solutions
* Collaborate closely with HR, IT, and key stakeholders to ensure solutions deliver measurable business value
* Ensure optimal, efficient, and best-practice use of Oracle HCM throughout the organization
* Participate in system integrations, data flows, and technical design across platforms
* Apply best-practice methodologies and contribute to IT process improvements (e.g., ITIL)
* Work in agile sprints together with developers, project managers, and external vendors
* Support the development, optimization, and maintenance of HR processes after system implementation


**This is what you will contribute with:**
* Deep technical expertise within HR systems, preferably Oracle HCM
* Understanding of HR processes and how to turn business needs into system solutions
* The ability to communicate clearly across teams and borders
* A structured, analytical mindset and a strong drive to make things happen


**Who are you?**
 You are a tech-savvy and collaborative person who thrives in the intersection between HR and IT. You are driven, curious, and want to be part of building something long-term.
   

  

**We believe you bring:**
* A university degree and 3+ years of experience with Oracle HCM or similar HRIS platforms
* Solid knowledge of HRIS functionality – especially in Core HCM, Compensation, Recruitment and Onboarding
* Experience from at least one full-cycle HRIS implementation, preferably in an international environment
* Familiarity with reporting/analytics tools used within HR
* Excellent communication skills and the ability to work cross-functionally
* Fluent English and minimum basic Swedish
* Willingness to travel approximately once a month to Denmark and other locations in Europe during the implementation phase


**About DOVISTA**
 DOVISTA Group is the leading supplier of facade windows and exterior doors in Europe, with approximately 6,600 employees across 10 European countries. We are owned by the VKR Group – a Danish family and foundation-owned company with around 19,000 employees worldwide.
   

  

 In Sweden, we operate under the brands Svenska Fönster, Mockfjärds, and VELFAC – with a total of around 600 employees. We offer a collaborative and development-oriented culture, driven by continuous improvement and long-term sustainability.
   

  

 The position is based in Solna, with regular interaction with our international offices and teams. Our Swedish HQ and production facility are located in Edsbyn, and we also have a regional office in Borlänge.
   

  

*Location: Solna, Sweden (Hybrid)*
**Contact**
 In this recruitment, DOVISTA collaborates with Wise IT. For more information, please contact Recruitment Consultant Sandra Åhs at sandra.ahs@wiseit.se.
   

  

 Please note: We are unable to accept applications via email due to GDPR regulations. All applications must be submitted through the official application system.
   

  

 We review applications continuously, and interviews are conducted on a rolling basis.
   

  

**We look forward to your application!**

title: Research Engineer in experimental physics
description:
### **Job description**


You will work as a research engineer within the Quantum Materials group and assist the members of the group in developing the experimental setups that the group runs. Specifically, you will work with the design and development of mechanical components for the various experiments as well as maintenance and fault rectification.

### **What we offer**

* A position at a leading technical university that generates knowledge and skills for a sustainable future.
* Engaged and ambitious colleagues along with a creative, international and dynamic working environment
* Work in Stockholm, in close proximity to nature
* Guidance on relocating and settling in KTH and in Sweden.
* Work with experimental equipment at the absolute research frontier.
* Opportunity to participate in the work of realizing new types of setups and experiments.
* Possibility to participate in running experiments
* Freedom to plan your own work


Read more about what it's like to work at KTH and our benefits.

### **Qualifications**

**Requirements**

* A graduate degree or an advanced level (higher education) in the research subject or equivalent competence.
* Documented experience in mechanical design and experience with CAD.
* Substantial experience of practical technical work

**Preferred qualifications**

* As a person, you are service-oriented and find it easy to collaborate. You are at the same time self-motivated and goal-oriented with the ability to drive projects all the way to implementation. You have a broad interest in technology and a willingness to learn new subjects and techniques.
* We would like you to have experience of working with precision mechanics and workshop work such as the use of lathes, milling machines, NC machines, etc.
* We would also like you to have experience in one or several of the topics optics and optical design, high-power lasers, vacuum technology and cryotechnology.
* It is also a merit if you have experience of working with software control of hardware as well as working in multicultural environments and awareness of diversity and equal treatment issues with a particular focus on gender equality.


Great emphasis will be placed on personal skills.

### **Trade union representatives**


Contact information to trade union representatives.

### **To apply for the position**


Log into KTH's recruitment system to apply for this position. You are responsible for ensuring that your application is complete according to the instructions in the ad.


The application must include:

* CV including relevant professional experience and knowledge.
* Copy of diplomas and grades from your previous university studies. Translations into English or Swedish if the original documents have not been issued in any of these languages.
* Three examples of parts or mechanical systems designed with CAD.
* Brief account of your motivations for applying, expectations and future goals. Maximally two pages long.


Your complete application must be received by KTH no later than the last day of application, midnight CET/CEST (Central European Time/Central European Summer Time).

### **About the employment**


The employment is valid until further notice (permanent post) according to agreement.
  

The employment begins with a six-month probationary period.

### **Other information**


Striving towards gender equality, diversity and equal conditions is both a question of quality for KTH and a given part of our values


For information about processing of personal data in the recruitment process.


It may be the case that a position at KTH is classified as a security-sensitive role in accordance with the Protective Security Act (2018:585). If this applies to the specific position, a security clearance will be conducted for the applicant in accordance with the same law with the applicant's consent. In such cases, a prerequisite for employment is that the applicant is approved following the security clearance.


We firmly decline all contact with staffing and recruitment agencies and job ad salespersons.


Disclaimer: *In case of discrepancy between the Swedish original and the English translation of the job announcement, the Swedish version takes precedence.*

  

About KTH KTH Royal Institute of Technology in Stockholm has grown to become one of Europe’s leading technical and engineering universities, as well as a key centre of intellectual talent and innovation. We are Sweden’s largest technical research and learning institution and home to students, researchers and faculty from around the world. Our research and education covers a wide area including natural sciences and all branches of engineering, as well as architecture, industrial management, urban planning, history and philosophy. Read more here

title: Sr Software Quality Engineer
description:
Malwarebytes believes that when people and organizations are free from threats, they are free to thrive. Founded in 2008, CEO Marcin Kleczynski had one mission: to rid the world of malware. Today, Malwarebytes has grown beyond malware remediation to ensuring cyberprotection for everyone, providing device protection, privacy, and prevention solutions in the home, on-the-go, at work, or on campus. With threat hunters and innovators across the world, we want great people, like YOU, to join our team!  

**Malwarebytes is looking for...**

We are in a relentless battle against malware creators who play by rules. This challenge demands more than just intelligence and technical expertise—it requires adaptability, independence, a passion for continuous learning, and a creative approach to problem-solving. We are seeking a collaborative test engineer who thrives in a dynamic, multi-project environment, excels in improving test processes and execution, and wants to find good bugs.  

**What You Will Do**:* Comprehend and execute test cases (manual and automated)
* Uncover, document, and track defects
* Improve test case execution efficiency and test coverage
* Work in an agile development environment, collaborating with developers and others to deliver quality software iteratively
* Participating in requirements testing
* Be an integral part of the team while continuously participating in improving process and test methodologies, execution efficiency and effectiveness

**Skills You'll Need to Have**:* Strong understanding of testing theory and best practices in software testing
* Extensive experience with Android platform testing, including functional, UI, and exploratory testing
* Deep understanding of Android architecture and system components
* Proficiency with Android Studio, ADB, Firebase, and emulators for debugging and testing
* Hands-on experience with Test Automation (developing test cases and maintaining frameworks using Java/Kotlin)
* Knowledge of automation tools such as Appium or Selenium
* Proven track record of taking ownership of QA processes, ensuring quality at every stage of the development lifecycle
* 3+ years of experience in a QA role within agile teams, focusing on mobile applications
* Excellent analytical and critical thinking skills, with the ability to quickly identify and troubleshoot complex issues
* Strong organizational skills and ability to prioritize tasks effectively in a dynamic environment
* Ability to mentor team members and provide guidance on QA best practices

**Skills that are Nice to Have**:* Experience with CI/CD tools (e.g., GitHub Actions, Jenkins) for integrating automated tests into pipelines
* Experience conducting performance, load, and stress testing for mobile applications
* Good knowledge of API testing, including tools like Postman, REST Assured, or similar
* Familiarity with Google services and tools, particularly Firebase (e.g., Crashlytics, Analytics)
* Experience with cross-platform testing, including Apple products (iOS and iPadOS apps)
* Familiarity with accessibility testing standards and tools to ensure compliance with accessibility guidelines
* Excellent communication skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams
* A proactive mindset, constantly seeking opportunities to improve QA processes and overall product quality

**Benefits and Perks**:* An opportunity to do something great for yourself and the world
* A great work environment that supports growth, development, and well-being
* Comprehensive medical, dental, and vision insurance coverage, subject to change by country/region
* Employee Referral Bonus Program
* Wellness programs

title: Senior Systems Engineer
description:
##### **Project description**

DXC Luxoft is a leading global software services company, delivering professional services across multiple business verticals such as finance, automotive, and digital transformation.  

  

The Automotive practice inside DXC Luxoft delivers software projects to a majority of the world's car manufacturers and suppliers for both personal and commercial vehicles. We are known for our Automotive software expertise and for helping our customers with high quality services and deliveries.  

Currently we are growing for our Swedish customers and are looking for Functional Safety experts to join our team. You will be part of our growing organization in Sweden and will be part of developing next generation systems for the Automotive industry in the era of connected, autonomous, electric vehicles.


##### **Responsibilities**


Functional Safety implementation of electronic vehicle functions as per the Safety process at System and Software level, which includes Safety Concept definition and Safety Management activities.


Lead and perform system safety work products e.g., TSC, Safety Case, HARA.


Lead and perform software related work products, safety requirements, safety architecture, etc.


Lead and perform Safety Analysis like FMEA, FTA, DFA.


Perform verification and confirmation reviews.


Support in implementation of Safety process in the project.


##### **Skills**


Must have


Qualification as AFSP (Automotive Functional Safety Professional) from SGS-TÜV Saar or a comparable qualification from an accredited provider.


At least 3 years of continuous practical experience as a moderator for the implementation of H&Rs, FMEA, FTA according to ISO2626


Senior System Safety competence (ISO 26262


Part 3, Part 4, HARA).


Excellent leadership and communication skills.


Knowledge and experience from working with suppliers and working in an international environment.


Experience with Team Center.


Experience with Car/System Weaver.


Soft skills:


team players, practical and pragmatic by nature


great communication skills to successfully advise and support the organization


Nice to have


VDA standard VDA702 (Situation Catalog E-Parameter according to ISO26262-3), or VDA Part 4 (fault tree analyses).


Driver licence

Languages


English: C2 Proficient


Seniority


Senior


  
Remote Sweden, Sweden

Functional/System Analysis
